body:
There is a lot of overlap between this code and `emitBuiltinCall`. Is it possible to just call, e.g. `emitBuiltinCall("add", ...`.

The problem is that this code duplication is very fragile. For instance, liftConstantAttributes is not being called in this pathway but is being called in the builtin pathway.

body_text:
There is a lot of overlap between this code and emitBuiltinCall. Is it possible to just call, e.g. emitBuiltinCall("add", ....
The problem is that this code duplication is very fragile. For instance, liftConstantAttributes is not being called in this pathway but is being called in the builtin pathway.
